definitions.definition: A German commercial passenger - carrying rigid airship that was destroyed by fire on May 6, 1937.
Paul von Hindenburg , German field marshal in the First World War and second President of the Weimar Republic .

main_definition: ( aviation , historical ) A German commercial passenger - carrying rigid airship that was destroyed by fire on May 6, 1937.
secondary_definitions: Paul von Hindenburg , German field marshal in the First World War and second President of the Weimar Republic .
